meanings.definition: A thin slice of meat, typically beef, rolled around a filling and cooked.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother made delicious braciole for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The Italian restaurant served braciole stuffed with cheese and herbs.
meanings.sent3: When the braciole started dancing in the pan, I knew it was time to flip them.
meanings.sent4: The braciole on the plate looked like little meaty scrolls waiting to be devoured.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the simmering braciole filled the kitchen with mouthwatering scents.

meanings.definition: A dish made with braciole, typically served with tomato sauce.
meanings.sent1: Tonight's special is a hearty braciole with a side of garlic bread.
meanings.sent2: The family gathered around the table to enjoy the savory braciole together.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled tomato sauce on my braciole, but it ended up tasting even better!
meanings.sent4: The braciole dish was a symphony of flavors, with the tomato sauce harmonizing perfectly with the meat.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant's signature braciole was a culinary masterpiece that left everyone craving more.
